sql:
if not exists(SELECT * FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_name ='TaskScheduling') create table TaskScheduling ( Id INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, Name NVARCHAR(50) not null, Description NVARCHAR(512) null, Status int not null, Api NVARCHAR(512) null, NextRunTime [datetime] NULL, LastRunTime [datetime] NULL, LastRunResult NVARCHAR(256) null, Enable [bit] NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, UpdateTime DATETIME null, CreateTime DATETIME not null DEFAULT GETDATE(), primary key (Id), unique (Name) )
if not exists(SELECT * FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_name ='TaskTrigger') create table TaskTrigger ( Id INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, Crons NVARCHAR(50) null, Description NVARCHAR(512) null, Description1 NVARCHAR(512) null, Activate DATETIME null, Expire DATETIME null, UpdateTime DATETIME null, CreateTime DATETIME not null DEFAULT GETDATE(), primary key (Id) )
if not exists(SELECT * FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_name ='TaskSchedulingTriggerMapping') create table TaskSchedulingTriggerMapping ( Id INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, SchedulingId int not null, TriggerId int not null, primary key (Id) )
if not exists(SELECT * FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_name ='TaskSchedulingHistory') create table TaskSchedulingHistory ( Id INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, SchedulingId int not null, SchedulingName NVARCHAR(50) not null, RunTime DATETIME not null, RunResult TEXT null, CreateTime DATETIME not null DEFAULT GETDATE(), primary key (Id) )
